reviews.review_msg: His notes are really tough to understand and look back on. He covers a lot of theory and proofs while not doing too many examples. His weight distribution of marks put way too much emphasis on the final. Good person but class could be structured and delivered better.

Kamal's assignments and exam questions are all based off of his lecture notes and textbook. As long as you studied his notes and read textbook, you can make through without any issue. However, I'm not a big fan of his messy and disorganized notes since they are hard to read sometimes. Also he gives a lot of assignments. Other than that, solid prof.

The lecture notes are challenging to follow and understand, making it difficult to grasp the material. Additionally, the test questions are quite difficult. The grade distribution is heavily weighted, with only 10% allocated to homework and 90% determined by midterms and finals, which puts significant pressure on exam performance.

Lecture notes are hard to read and lectures themselves are a little dry. He follows the textbook pretty closely and notes down in the lecture notes what parts of the textbook are omitted. I skipped every lecture and just read the textbook. 

Exams are pretty fair if you just do some textbook problems. Definitely make use of office hours.
If you complain about kamal pls go take ensc316 with bernhard. Do the example on the textbook, everything will sort out
Notes were not great and I didn't understand the structure of the course. The explanations were all over the place.
Stay away from this instructor
Aight
He does not scale. Class average was a C. Have fun with those notes!
Would recommend taking the course. He's very thorough in the notes. Would recommend attending lectures and starting the homework early. The homework is almost entirely based on the notes or textbook.
This prof is a horrible prof and stink at explaining things.  Professor who stink at explaining things
This prof is a horrible prof.  Professor who stink at explaining things

Lectures are heavy and you do have lots of assignments. However, the course is very interesting and prof is always open to help. Project is time consuming, but also essential to understand the course material and fun to do
He doesn't know how to teach you at all! just go through the textbook and learn from it. At lot of workload and no study materials(assignment, MTs solution etc.)

This professor repeats the materials in the textbook without further examples. No solutions to the assignment, midterm to study. This professor materials does not help with doing the project. No sample input/output of the project and time consuming. If you are taking this course with him, better not take any other heavy courses.
Too much work. TA sucks. Read the textbook and save yourself tons of time
Has bad temper! Watch out! And slow marker too!
Very knowledgeable and enthusiastic about his teachings. Very helpful and extremely nice. One of the best professors I've had up to PhD level.
Very knowledgeable, intelligent and enthusiastic.
Excellent!Very knowledgable.
Good prof. Very intelligent and enthusiastic!
Good guy overall...very helpful, clear and friendly. Nothing bad to say really. :)
Final is a killer!! This guy marks slowly. You get your marks like a month after u finish the midterm.
yes yes thank you thank you
Smart and Cool. Very fair and helpful to students.
